translations: 贬低，诋毁，轻视（disparage 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He was critical of the people, disparaging of their crude manners.
sentences.translation: 他批评那些人，贬低他们粗鲁的举止。

sentences.sentence: With other audiences you mustn't attempt to cut in with humor as they will resent an outsider making disparaging remarks about their canteen or their chairman.
sentences.translation: 对于其他听众，你不能试图用幽默来打断他们的谈话，因为他们会讨厌一个外人对他们的餐厅或董事长发表轻蔑的评论。

sentences.sentence: He laughed when I did a disparaging laugh wondering aloud at what kind of American I was.
sentences.translation: 当我真喝趴下的时候，他哈哈大笑，一种轻视的笑，还惊讶地大声说我这算是哪门子美国人。
